summary: Day 13: Favorite Location
body:
Day 13: Favorite Location

Stark/Avengers Tower


There’s so many iconic scenes that have happened here! (Pepper x Tony’s first kiss and the AOU party being some of my favorites.) Plus, this is the location of most of my (and probably a lot of your) 2012 headcanons on the Avengers’ hang-out sessions. I was really sad when the tower made it’s last appearance in Spider-Man: Homecoming.

summary: The Captain Bucky Barnes x Avenger!Reader Warnings: Cap dies in Infinity War, Fluffy a/n: this was written before IW came out...
body:
The Captain

Bucky Barnes x Avenger!Reader

Warnings: Cap dies in Infinity War, Fluffy

a/n: this was written before IW came out lol

“So where’s the captain and Y/n?” Natasha asked as she walked with Clint through the hallways of the avenger’s facility. “Probably making out somewhere,” he answered raising an eyebrow, nat laughed.

You stood on the roof of the abandoned warehouse overlooking new york city before your mission. Things had changed. It was 2 years after the war, the world was still healing…..the Avengers were still healing. You hadn’t known Steve as long as the others, Tony recruited you to the team a few months after Steve had gone rogue. He was how you met the love of your life. The rest pretend like his death didn’t faze them as much, Tony drinks a lot more now, you could here Natasha sobs through her rooms thin walls, Thor doesn’t like walking by steves door and Sam can’t listen to any of the music he used to love without thinking of him. But the one who hurt the most was bucky.

“Till the end of the line.”

They were supposed to go together, steves last moments replay in his head over and over again. The Quinn-jet was shot down by an alien enemy and landed hard on the cliff that Steve was standing on, a large piece of the cliff fell into the ravine and Steve fell with it. 

It all started and ended with a fall.

You helped bucky as much as you could. Long nights of drinking tea or cocoa because he was afraid to sleep, random tears would erupt from his eyes when his mind drifted to it. He always called you Ingerul meu (my angel in Romanian) because you somehow saved him, emotionally. You were the light of his darkness, happiness and hope just followed you around. Tony wanted the name Captain America to live on in a way of honoring Steve and everything he believed in. Not that Steve could be replaced, his shield needed to be passed not to someone exactly like Steve but someone who has the same morals. Many names crossed Tony’s mind but then he thought; this isn’t a matter of what he wants but of what Steve would’ve wanted. Then it came to him…when Steve was in his darkest the one thing he was missing was his best friend.

Bucky.

You heard the loud creak of the roof’s rusty metal doors open and the sounds of boots padding against the gravel. His arms snake around you leather-clad waist as he placed a soft kiss beneath your ear. “Are you okay?” he let go and sat down on the floor, his back pressed against the edge of the roof. Your gloved finger grazed over the Captain America trading card Colson had given to you. “Better than ever.” He sighed and looked at the ground. Bucky had on the cap suit that Colson designed, it was similar to steves except the arms had black sleeves/bottoms and red gloves to still resemble bucky. He had the shield attached to the back of his suit, it was the same shield Steve had; they had retrieved it along with his body. “Are you okay?” you sat next to him. “I don’t know if I’m ready for this Y/n.” he shook his head. “Hey stop doubting yourself, your gonna be great, okay. I promise.” You took his hand in yours and squeezed it.

 "There are so many other people I can think of that deserve his place…Why me? I’ve murdered people, I don’t deserve to be their hero.“ His voice cracked slightly. "Because your his best friend James, there is nobody he trusts more or has more faith in than you, he would be so proud of you. All the things you did wasn’t you that was the winter soldier.”

“What if I mess up.” his icy eyes looked into yours.

“Just be your self, be James Buchanan Barnes, be the man I fell in love with, be the guy who fought for freedom, be the guy who was strong enough to represent his best friend no matter how much it pains him. Be Bucky.” You said in almost a whisper as you hand him the trading card. “He still looks better in the uniform.” You both laughed. “Now come on we have bad guys to fight, buildings to jump off of and other super heroly things to do.” You jumped to your feet and thrust your hand out to him. He takes after slipping the card into a small pocket. Looking over the edge his eyes widen.

“That’s a lot higher than I expected.”

“Oh come on, I’ll race ya.” You lifted yourself onto the ledge as bucky watched in horror. “You’re Insane you know that right.” “I know.” And with that, you lept from the ledge with grace and onto the dirt below.

“I love you but imma take the stairs.”

-sunshinelacrimi on wattpad-

blog.title: Bucky Barnes’ Lemons
blog.description: Re-posting my favourite MCU imagines & making up theories

summary: *SPOILER* Ant-Man & The Wasp
body:
*SPOILER* Ant-Man & The Wasp

Okay I admit, the first post-credit scene blew my mind bUT NOT ENOUGH PEOPLE ARE TALKING ABOUT THE LAST ONE


I KNOW IT WAS A TROLL SCENE BUT DID U SEE THE TV AT THE START OF IT!??! THE DAMN FREAKING TV, THE FREAKING SOUND IT MADE AND HOW IT SAID SOMETHING ALONG THE LINES OF “stay calm, instructions will be given soon” (can’t remember the exact words) AND THAT SRSLY MADE MY SKIN CRAWL AND WAS BEYOND CREEPY! THANOS DID IT GUYS! THE WORLD IS CONFUSED AND LOST AND EVERYONE IS PANICKING AND NO ONE KNOWS WHAT TO FREAKING DO BECAUSE FOR THE FIRST TIME, THE AVENGERS LOST! HALF OF THE WORLD IS GONE! THERES NO SIGNAL TO THE BROADCAST! PEOPLE ARE SCARED, THEY DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO WITHOUT THE AVENGERS! THIS SCENE GOT ME MORE THAN THE FIRST ONE AND IM NOT SORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL

please don’t sleep on the secound post credit scene

summary: Tony Stark Imagine
title: Tony Stark Imagine
body:
Tony Stark is my favorite Avenger so here is my Imagine 

+ I think my favorite thing to imagine is Tony Stark programming a suit to y/n. It’s not really something that would be understood or talked about ever, though. In fact, it probably wouldn’t be made clear that Tony had programmed a suit to his significant other until the fighting has come to a cease all and people start to disappear, y/n included. The suit would probably sense imminent danger but by the time it gets there, y/n has already disintegrated.

+ Bonus points for Tony getting a signal that his only other suit has been deployed and thinking his s/o is still alive so when he finally gets back to Earth, he’s expecting his partner but gets an empty suit.

In fact, it probably wouldn’t be made clear that Tony had programmed a suit to his significant other until the fighting has come to a cease all and people start to disappear, y/n included. The suit would probably sense imminent danger but by the time it gets there, y/n has already disintegrated.

+ Bonus points for Tony getting a signal that his only other suit has been deployed and thinking his s/o is still alive so when he finally gets back to Earth, he’s expecting his partner but gets an empty suit.

summary: Tony Stark’s daughter-part fifteen
body:
Tony Stark’s daughter-part fifteen

Buckys POV

“Y/N/N, you know me, right?”I asked; if there was one thing that would make her remember everything that Hydra did to her, then it would be the memory of the first day we met…because it was the first day she was tortured.. I saw her nod slowly, a confused expression coming across her face.

“How did we meet?”I asked, a short silence filling the room as she scanned my eyes; the confusion still evident on her face.

“We met at Hydra,” she answered.

“But where in Hydra did we meet?” I asked,moving closer to her. The first day that I met Y/N/N was when she was put in cell next to mine…she was crying; wanting the pain from her injuries to stop. She had to remember that. I looked at her, scanning her yes in a hope to see her remembering. There was a long silence as Y/N/N stared back into my eyes; as if she was trying to work things out in her head.

“We-we met…” she stuttered,looking down at her feet.

“Y/N/N, I know you remember where we met…you just need to think about it,” I said softly,my hand still wrapped around hers.

Y/Ns POV

My head was spinning, Hydra were my family…they didn’t kidnap me, Tony abandoned me and hydra saved me. That was the truth…but if that was the truth then why was the Winter Soldier telling me differently..part of me thought that he was lying…but all I could see in his eyes was pure honesty and it just confused me.

“I don’t understand why you’re saying all these things…why does it even matter?” I asked, trying to move my hand out of his grip.

“Y/N/N, the first day we met; it was the first day that Hydra tortured you…you wanted to go home and be back with your dad; and they wouldn’t let you so you tried to run away, and the guards found you…they took you to the lab and they tortured you..that’s how you got those scars, from the torture that they put you through.” The Winter Soldier said, tightening his grip on my hand slightly.

“You’re lying…they would never….they wouldn’t do something like that…” I whispered, as my head began pounding.

“Y/N/N, doll, when have I ever lied to you..I know you don’t want to believe it; but this isn’t you, this…this is the monster Hydra created.” He stated, and as he said that the pain in my head grew…and my vision went blurry, until I was consumed by darkness.

Stephen Strange POV

Happy and I burst through the door, Y/N/N and Bucky were nowhere to be seen; our eyes darted around until they landed on Peter…lying on the floor, covered in blood.

“Shit” Happy almost shouted as he ran over to Peter.

“Peter, c’mon kid, you need to wake up.” he said crouching over his body, as he began cpr.

“Move,” I said simply, as I walked over to Peters body.

“What are you going to do?” Happy asked, his eyes filled with tears.

“I used to be a surgeon… I was the best there was,” I said as I teleported some of my surgical tools from my upstairs office.

“Strange, are you sure about this…there was a reason you stopped being a surgeon,” Happy interjected as i grabbed one of the tools.

“Thank you for the immense lack of faith you have in me; he won’t make it to the hospital and teleporting him would just kill him straight away. If I don’t do this, he dies. Now, you can either help me or leave; but I need you to trust that I know what I’m doing.” And with that being said, Happy knelt down opposite me.

“Tell me what you need me to do,” He said, removing his blazar and rolling up his sleeves.

“Well we’re going to need to remove the bullet from his chest,” I began, as I made the first cut.

“I’m going to need you to help me get that bullet out…and to make sure he keeps breathing, okay?” I asked, and Happy instantly nodded.

Buckys POV

I caught Y/N as she passed out and I put her on the sofa that was in the middle of the room; I only hoped that when she woke up she was back to normal..that she was back to my Y/N/N.

I knew that this was a Hydra safe house…and that there was no point trying to escape because we wouldn’t even make it past the front door; but I also knew that there were cameras here…how else would the scientist be able to keep an eye on Y/N/N and I; so i went round the house finding countless cameras and disconnecting them…maybe this would be able to buy me a little bit of time…enough for Y/N/N to wake up and remember that they were the enemy. And then somehow…we could escape this hell, and go back to Sanctum Santorum…and then from there we could work on getting the others back….I just needed to wait for Y/N/N to wake up…but time was certainly running out. Trying to remain calm, I sat infront of the sofa, waiting for Y/N/N to wake up…holding on to a small slither of hope..that everything was going to be okay…

blog.name: mxrvel-imxgines-blog
blog.title: Well Imagine That
blog.description:
taking requests for any marvel character! hmu sometime, I love getting messages and talking to y’all

-also known as Delmar on Quotev- Masterlist

summary: Avengers Fake Relationship - Confession -Headcanons Pt.1
body:
Avengers Fake Relationship - Confession -Headcanons Pt.1

Steve Rogers

  • The mission had ended almost a month ago and the feelings you harbored for Steve had not yet disappeared
  • You decided that the best option now was to admit how you felt and get it out of the way
  • Besides, Steve could have anyone he wanted - he was literally the perfect man - why would he want you?
  • Your hands were shaking as you approached him in the kitchen of the Compound
  • Steve had actually just finished working out and was getting some water (he’s hydrating lol), attempting to busy himself so he could get you off of his mind - he was constantly flustered around you now and he wasn’t sure why
  • Actually, he definitely knew why
  • He had fallen head over heels for you without a doubt
  • When he saw you approaching him, he stood up a little straighter and hoped he didn’t look as sweaty as he felt
  • You nervously straightened out your blouse, folding your hands neatly in front of you to hide your shaking hands
  • “Hello Steve, how are you?”
  • Him stuttering out a reply and feeling like he was back in the 40s because he realized he was standing in front of an incredibly beautiful woman out of his league
  • Or so he thought
  • You exhaled deeply and eventually stuttered out, “Ever since the mission… I’ve been having these feelings for you - and I know you don’t feel the sa-,”
  • Not getting to finish because Steve is so happy and relieved because wow it’s not unrequited that he picks you up and twirls you around
  • Coming to a stop and realizing how close you both are together
  • “But I do feel the same.” He’s leaning over you, dipping you down slightly as if you were dancing
  • You’re so close you could kiss
  • You do
  • It’s the greatest feeling - it’s slow and sweet and your hands are cupping his face and it just feels so right
  • “can you pleASE NOT MAKE OUT IN THE KITCHEN” (Tony screeches)

Tony Stark

  • Just like you thought - you’re a confused mess of emotions after the party
  • And it’s been almost two months since the party
  • Every time you saw Tony your heart rate would jump and you’d flush a deep red that was definitely noticeable
  • You started avoiding him so he wouldn’t notice
  • He started noticing how you’d avoid him at every chance and this further rooted the idea that you probably hated him for what he did at the party
  • Until one day he managed to catch you alone in one of the conference rooms reorganizing some security files
  • He leaned over the back of your rolley chair, effectively trapping you in, “Why’ve you been avoiding me [Y/n]”
  • The whisper sent shivers down your spine and you could feel a flush rising up your neck and you couldn’t do anything but mumble a undistinguishable response
  • Tony wasn’t sure at this point what you really felt - your body language was pointing more in the direction that maybe you reciprocated his feelings
  • He picked some of the papers up that were in your grasp, pretending to look over them but really just consciously letting his fingers drift against yours
  • You were certainly blushing now and there was no hiding it - you wished you didn’t have these feelings - the Tony Stark would never choose you out of all the women he could have
  • “I’d like to take you on a date tonight”
  • Nearly falling out of your chair at his statement, spoken so nonchalantly, but when you met his gaze he did seem a little flustered
  • “Really?”
  • “Of course. I wouldn’t want to go with anyone other than the woman I love.” He returned to overlooking the paper, scared to see your reaction
  • Your mouth fell open in shock
  • Then you realized all those flirty moves he’d been using on you all along really did have meaning behind them and you smirked a little
  • “I’ll meet you back here at 7 then, Tony.”
  • You swayed your hips as you left
  • Tony couldn’t help but stare

Bruce Banner

  • It turned out that you did eventually have to get a restraining order and that faking a relationship with Bruce only broke your heart
  • You craved those soft glances and gentle touches of his
  • You started finding excuses to be around him - attempting to engage in conversation about the lab experiments you didn’t quite understand and bringing him little snacks
  • Bruce was pretty aware of how much time you were spending with him since that day
  • Was it possible that you liked him back?
  • He decided to finally confess - it was worth a shot
  • You’d be standing next to each other, shoulders touching, as he looked over some results
  • Suddenly you felt his weight shift and he was leaning in to you, his warmth making your stomach jump
  • You glanced over at him and met his gaze, feeling a small blush rise to your cheeks
  • How was he making you feel like a lovesick teenager? This was something you’d never felt in your previous relationships
  • He was nearly shaking in his shoes, pressing his hands firmly down onto the counter to calm his nerves
  • Him attempting to say something witty but it just comes out as an awkward jumble of words
  • Your mouth quirks up into a small smile, and even though he’s pretty embarrassed, he loves it
  • “I - uh, I really do, um - would you like to grab a coffee sometime?”
  • Your smile growing wider and you agree, your fingers closing in around his
  • The room grows silent and tense as you continue staring into each other’s eyes
  • It’s almost as if there’s some sort of pull between you
  • You suddenly find yourself reaching up and caressing his face
  • And then your kissing
  • And then your pulling away very quickly as Tony drags his busted prototype into the lab - confused at the two of you and your flustered behavior

Thor Odinson

  • The wedding went perfectly as planned although your sister did facetime you and playfully chastise you for stealing all the attention during the dance
  • The more she had gushed about Thor, the worse you felt because you really did like him
  • So you finally broke the news to your sister and nearly started bawling, explaining it was just a show but you felt so much for him
  • And she was slightly discouraged but completely understood - “You should’ve seen the way he looked at you [Y/n], he definitely likes you”
  • So you decided to go for it thanks to the encouragement of your sister
  • You and Thor were just chilling in the common room of the compound, watching your favorite tv series
  • You were snuggled up in a large blanket, barely focusing on the show but on how fast your heart was beating just trying to work up the courage to tell him
  • Thor was sprawled our next to you, his arms crossed behind his head, looking extremely relaxed
  • He was, in fact, tearing himself apart on the inside - he wanted badly to pull you into his arms like he’d done at the wedding
  • And then a thought occurred to him - why couldn’t he?
  • So he played dumb
  • He grabbed your cocooned form and hugged you tightly into his chest, immensely enjoying the flustered look on your face
  • You were absolutely stunned, your heart pounding hard in your chest
  • You stared up at him until his eyes met yours - they held such an innocent look, but there was something else there that you couldn’t put your finger on
  • Thor couldn’t take the unbearable silence much more and frowned in faux confusion “What troubles you [Y/n]?”
  • “I like you!” You blurted out, unable to contain yourself any longer “I’ve had these feelings for you forever now-“
  • Thor’s small smile widened into a grin and he pulled you closer into him, kissing you on the forehead
  • He couldn’t believe that he was so lucky to have his feelings reciprocated by you
  • “I feel the same”
  • Hiding your flushed face in your blankets but unable to stop smiling, continuing to peek up at the God of Thunder
